Package managers

Class StudentManager

java.lang.Object
managers.StudentManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
EntityManager
public class StudentManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements EntityManager
Controller class for handling Student Entities

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentManager

      public StudentManager() throws FileReadingException
      Constructor
      Throws:
      FileReadingException - thrown if student details cannot be accessed

  • Method Details

    • getStudent

      public Student getStudent​(java.lang.String identifier) throws KeyNotFoundException
      Method to retrieve a Student object from system
      Parameters:
      identifier - String identifier. Either userID or matriculation number
      Returns:
      Returns student based on identifier (either matricNo or userId)
      Throws:
      KeyNotFoundException - thrown if student cannot be identified

    • getStudents

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Student> getStudents()
      Method to get HashMap of all students in system
      Returns:
      HashMap of all students in system. Matriculation number and User ID are used as keys

    • createStudent

      public void createStudent​(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String gender, java.lang.String nationality, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String matricNo, java.time.LocalDateTime[] accessPeriod) throws KeyClashException, MissingParametersException
      Method to create new student and add to system
      Parameters:
      userId - UserID of new student. Must be unique
      name - Name of new student
      gender - Gender of new student
      nationality - Nationality of new student
      email - Email address of new student
      matricNo - Matriculation number of new student
      accessPeriod - Access period of new student
      Throws:
      KeyClashException - thrown if details required to be unique are not
      MissingParametersException - thrown if any above fields are null

    • addCourse

      public int addCourse​(Course course, Index index, Student student) throws InvalidInputException
      Method to try and register student for a course Only allowed if student has sufficient academic units and slots are available If no slots are available, student will be automatically waitlisted
      Parameters:
      course - Course to be registered
      index - Index to be registered
      student - Student to register
      Returns:
      int denoting status of registration (1. Successful registration, 0. Student waitlisted)
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - thrown if Student has insufficient academic units, or has already registered/waitlisted for the course

    • dropCourse

      public Student dropCourse​(Course course, Student student) throws InvalidInputException
      Allows a student to drop a course from either waitlist or list of registered courses
      Parameters:
      course - Course to drop
      student - Student wanting to drop
      Returns:
      student that was dropped
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - Thrown if student has not registered for course before (including waitlist)

    • swopIndex

      public Student[] swopIndex​(Student s1, Student s2, Course course) throws KeyNotFoundException
      Method to swop the indexes of 2 students for a course
      Parameters:
      s1 - First student
      s2 - Second student
      course - Course to swop index
      Returns:
      Updated Students s1, s2
      Throws:
      KeyNotFoundException - thrown if either student has not registered for the course

    • swopIndex

      public Student swopIndex​(Student student, Course course, Index newIndex) throws InvalidInputException, KeyNotFoundException
      Method to allow student to swop to another index within a course
      Parameters:
      student - Student swopping index
      course - Course to swop
      newIndex - Index to swop to
      Returns:
      Updated student
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - thrown if newIndex has no available slots
      KeyNotFoundException - thrown if student is not registered for the course

    • updateAccessPeriod

      public void updateAccessPeriod​(Student student, java.time.LocalDateTime[] newAccessPeriod) throws FileReadingException
      Method to change the access period of a student
      Parameters:
      student - Student to change access period
      newAccessPeriod - New access period to set
      Throws:
      FileReadingException - thrown if student's file cannot be accessed

    • printAllStudents

      public java.lang.String printAllStudents()
      Method to return list of students
      Returns:
      String with information of all students

    • dequeueWaitlist

      public void dequeueWaitlist​(Student fromWaitlist, Course course, Index index)
      Method to update a student after being successfully dequeued from waitlist
      Parameters:
      fromWaitlist - the student
      course - the course
      index - the index

    • saveState

      public void saveState​(java.lang.Object student)
      Method to save the state of a student object to a file
      Specified by:
      saveState in interface EntityManager
      Parameters:
      student - Student to be saved
